OOC:Okay i don't really care.... I flew away from you earlier so i
would really be like 20-30 steps but whatever i will go with this.

::Halucigen::
Halucigen calculated he could only save the alst two of the shots by
flinging his stinger up in front of his face. He did so but the first
shot, as calculated too, was by too quick and nailed Halucigen in the
head. He head snapped back and his mind went scrambled for a couple
seconds. He whipped his tail trying to wrap one of Hot Rod's legs
while firing four feather missiles from his wings that locked on to
Hot Rods head.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I can do that, like dcoburn said. If they were fighting before,
> then Hot Rod probably only walked like a step or two. You wouldn't have
> had time to get up and fly away. Its not cheap its the way it is. Just
> take the hits.
